DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this post-market study is to compare the post-procedure recovery between two types of minimally invasive catheter treatments for venous disease in the Great Saphenous Vein.
DOC.brief_title: ClosureFAST vs. Laser Ablation for the Treatment of GSV Disease: A Multicenter, Single-Blinded, Randomized Study.
DOC.detailed_description: Comparison of the post-procedure recovery of radiofrequency treatment vs. laser treatment.
DOC.criteria: All subjects must provide written informed consent. Must be a candidate for either treatment with RFA or endovenous laser. Subjects who require additional treatments in either leg within 30 days before or after the study procedure. Subjects who are participating in another investigational study.
DOC.keyword: Varicose veins, venous reflux, GSV disease
